page.title: 15The Bryanston Estate Club
page.content: The Club is open seven days a week. There are two bars, one for adults,the other for junior members. A live show, barbecue or disco is held fortnightly. There are Inter Club tournaments in all games. At present the Club has 7 skittles teams, 3 or 4 darts teams, 2 shove ha'penny teams,pool and cribbage teams.There is a ladies netball team. Young and old alike are involved in these activities & no single age group is specially catered for. Weekly bingo sessions and whist drives are more appealing to older members. Although priority is given to the village, the Club boasts members "from practically all over the world." Cheap subscriptions are given to those in the area only temporarily. The Club is used by the Dorset Darts Association & is much used for weddings & parties. It is also the local polling station.
